var.name: helpText
var.string: Asking questions with custom, limited answers.

var.name: helpText
var.string: Discussion tool useful for long running collaborations and situations where learners are not all on line at the same time.

var.name: helpText
var.string: Discussion tool useful for long running collaborations and situations where learners are not all on line at the same time.

var.name: helpText
var.string: Discussion tool useful for long running collaborations and situations where learners are not all on line at the same time.

var.name: description
var.string: Creates automated assessment questions. e.g. Multiple choice and true/false questions. Can provide feedback and scores.

var.name: helpText
var.string: Learner answers a series of automated assessment questions. e.g. Multiple choice and true/false questions. Optional features include feedback on each question and scoring. Questions are weighted for scoring.

var.name: description
var.string: Tool for displaying HTML content including external sources such as images and other media.

var.name: helpText
var.string: Displays formatted text and links to external sources on a read only page.

var.name: description
var.string: Each learner answers question(s) and then sees answers from all learners collated on the next page.

var.name: helpText
var.string: Each learner answers one or more questions in short answer format and then sees answers from all learners collated on the next page.

var.name: description
var.string: Learners submit files for assessment by the teacher. Scores and comments may be exported as a spreadsheet.

var.name: helpText
var.string: Learners submit files for assessment by the teacher. Scores and comments for each learner are recorded and may be exported as a spreadsheet.

var.name: helpText
var.string: Uploading your resources to share with others.
